courses.title: Build a Professional Booking Website with AI: From Zero to Launch
courses.subtitle: Learn how to build a complete booking website like lashdiary.co.ke using AI-powered development tools. No coding experience needed - perfect for beginners! Coming from someone who doesn't like to code that much!
courses.description:
This comprehensive course teaches you how to build a professional booking website from scratch using modern AI-powered development tools. You'll learn every step of the process, from setting up your development environment to deploying your live website with a custom domain.

**What You'll Build:**

You'll create a fully-functional booking website similar to lashdiary.co.ke, complete with:

- Beautiful, responsive frontend design
- Complete booking system with calendar integration
- Payment processing integration
- Client accounts and authentication
- Admin dashboard for managing bookings
- Email notifications and automated reminders
- Google Calendar integration
- Professional email setup
- Database integration

**Perfect for Beginners:**

This course is designed so that even a 12-year-old can follow along. Every step is explained in detail, with screenshots and exact prompts you'll use. No prior coding experience is required!

**What Makes This Course Special:**

- **Every Single Prompt:** You'll get access to every prompt used to build this website
- **Step-by-Step Instructions:** Detailed instructions for every process
- **Real-World Setup:** Learn how to buy domains, set up hosting, configure email, and more
- **Complete Transparency:** See exactly how a professional booking website is built
- **Lifetime Access:** Learn at your own pace with lifetime access to all materials

**ðŸŽ“ Certificate of Completion**

Upon completing this course, you will receive an official Certificate of Completion issued by LashDiary Labs. The certificate will be personalized with your name and can be downloaded or printed for your portfolio.
whatYoullLearn: Build a complete booking website from scratch using AI-powered development tools
Set up and configure your development environment step-by-step (GitHub, Cursor, hosting)
Use AI coding assistants to write code without prior programming experience
Design a clean, modern, and responsive frontend with full control over colors, layout, and theme
Create essential website pages (Homepage, About, Services, Contact, Booking)
Build a functional booking or contact system based on your website needs
Integrate Google Calendar to manage availability and prevent double bookings
Set up professional email communication using Zoho or Google email
Configure automated email notifications for form submissions and bookings
Store and manage website data using a Supabase database
Securely connect external services using environment variables
Integrate online payments using PayPal, Stripe and Pesapal (for African countries)
Purchase and connect a custom domain name to your website
Deploy your website to Netlify with proper build and security configuration
Enable SSL (HTTPS) for a professional and secure website
Understand every AI prompt and technical process used in building your website
Test, review, and fix errors using Cursorâ€™s AI assistance
